amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 116-502 to ensure that State Education Agencies have procedures in place to assess and prevent the redrawing of school district lines in a manner that increases racial or socioeconomic isolation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 116-502 to ensure that State Education Agencies have procedures in place to assess and prevent the redrawing of school district lines in a manner that increases racial or socioeconomic isolation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dean amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Dean.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Dean amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Dean amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
